Description: Papyrus fragment bearing four lines of a faded Coptic text written against the fibres (verso). Mounted with EA75398, 75397, 75396.
Curator's comments: The papyrus is coarse and abraded.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380709) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380709)
